question: I am 28 years and 6 months old. I am a doctor, jobless. I want to learn Quran by heart (Hafiz) and want to become religious scholar (Mufti) . What best advice you can give, Jazakallh.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Your intention in wanting to study the Deen of Allah is indeed noble.

We advise you enrol yourself as a Student of Hifz at an established class. This will be your first step in in fullfilling your intention. Once you have completed your Hifz, you may consider to further your studies in Deen. We make Dua that Allah helps you in your endeavours.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
